alert.note: Alert for Northern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:42AM CST until January 28 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Slippery travel and lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches of snow expected. Some locations not directly impacted by the snow band may end up with less than 2 inches of snow. * WHERE...Northern Will County. * WHEN...Through 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Conditions will be highly variable, potentially going from just flurries to reduced visibilities with accumulating snow over just a few mile stretch. Plan on snow covered roads impacting this mornings commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
